languages.text: "Также в конце записи есть фрагмент, где в предсмертном бреду Владайм повторяет мрачные бессвязные фразы, которые некоторые особо впечатлительные граждане начали считать чем-то вроде пророчества. Разведчики доносят, что с каждым днем на нижних уровнях Футфола появляется все больше безумцев с остекляневшим взглядом, бормочущих слова из этого "пророчества". Пока что они не представляют угрозы, но все это звучит весьма тревожно".

traits.locale_text: "Также в конце записи есть фрагмент, где в предсмертном бреду Владайм повторяет мрачные бессвязные фразы, которые некоторые особо впечатлительные граждане начали считать чем-то вроде пророчества. Разведчики доносят, что с каждым днем на нижних уровнях Футфола появляется все больше безумцев с остекляневшим взглядом, бормочущих слова из этого "пророчества". Пока что они не представляют угрозы, но все это звучит весьма тревожно".

languages.text: "Alas, there is more. The end of the recording includes a fragment where Vladaym repeats ominous incoherent phrases in his near-death delirium. Some particularly impressionable individuals now believe it to be a prophecy of sorts. Reconnaissance reports that every day the lower levels of Footfall see more and more lunatics with glassy eyes mumbling the words of this 'prophecy.' They do not pose any threat yet, but it is an indication of greater troubles to come."
languages.original_text: "Также в конце записи есть фрагмент, где в предсмертном бреду Владайм повторяет мрачные бессвязные фразы, которые некоторые особо впечатлительные граждане начали считать чем-то вроде пророчества. Разведчики доносят, что с каждым днем на нижних уровнях Футфола появляется все больше безумцев с остекляневшим взглядом, бормочущих слова из этого "пророчества". Пока что они не представляют угрозы, но все это звучит весьма тревожно".

traits.locale_text: "Also, the end of the recording includes a fragment of Vladaym repeating gloomy incoherent phrases in his near-death delirium believed by some particularly impressionable citizens to be a kind of a prophecy. Reconnaissance reports that every day lower levels of Footfall see more and more lunatics with glassy eyes mumbling words of this ‘prophecy'. They are not posing a threat yet, but all of this sounds quite disturbing."

"Also, the end of the recording includes a fragment of Vladaym repeating gloomy incoherent phrases in his near-death delirium believed by some particularly impressionable citizens to be a kind of a prophecy. Reconnaissance reports that every day lower levels of Footfall see more and more lunatics with glassy eyes mumbling words of this ‘prophecy'. They are not posing a threat yet, but all of this sounds quite disturbing."

"In addition, the end of the recording includes a fragment where Vladaym repeats dreary incoherent phrases in his near-death delirium. Some particularly impressionable citizens now believe it to be a prophecy of sorts. Reconnaissance reports that every day lower levels of Footfall see more and more lunatics with glassy eyes mumbling the words of this 'prophecy'. They are not posing any threat yet, but all of this is quite disconcerting."

"In addition, the end of the recording includes a fragment where Vladaym repeats dreary incoherent phrases in his near-death delirium. Some particularly impressionable citizens now believe it to be a prophecy of sorts. Reconnaissance reports that every day lower levels of Footfall see more and more lunatics with glassy eyes mumbling the words of this 'prophecy'. They are not posing any threat yet, but all of this is quite disconcerting."

"Alas, there is more. The end of the recording includes a fragment where Vladaym repeats ominous incoherent phrases in his near-death delirium. Some particularly impressionable individuals now believe it to be a prophecy of sorts. Reconnaissance reports that every day the lower levels of Footfall see more and more lunatics with glassy eyes mumbling the words of this 'prophecy.' They do not pose any threat yet, but it is an indication of greater troubles to come."

languages.text: “而且不仅如此，录音的最后还有一段：弗拉迪姆临死前，在精神错乱的状态中语无伦次地重复着几句意味不祥的话。如今，一群疯疯癫癫的人认为这是某种预言。根据侦察小组的报告，落脚港的底层每天都能看到越来越多的疯子。他们目光呆滞，喃喃重复着这样的‘预言’。这些疯子目前还没有构成威胁，但我们有理由相信，这些家伙早晚会惹出大麻烦。”
languages.original_text: "Alas, there is more. The end of the recording includes a fragment where Vladaym repeats ominous incoherent phrases in his near-death delirium. Some particularly impressionable individuals now believe it to be a prophecy of sorts. Reconnaissance reports that every day the lower levels of Footfall see more and more lunatics with glassy eyes mumbling the words of this 'prophecy.' They do not pose any threat yet, but it is an indication of greater troubles to come."

traits.locale_text: “而且不仅如此，录音的最后还有一段：弗拉迪姆临死前，在精神错乱的状态中语无伦次地重复着几句意味不祥的话。如今，一群疯疯癫癫的人认为这是某种预言。根据侦察小组的报告，落脚港的底层每天都能看到越来越多的疯子。他们目光呆滞，喃喃重复着这样的‘预言’。这些疯子目前还没有构成威胁，但我们有理由相信，这些家伙早晚会惹出大麻烦。”

languages.text: « Hélas, ça ne s'arrête pas là. La fin de l'enregistrement comporte un passage dans lequel Vladaym répète des phrases incohérentes et lugubres dans son délire de mort imminente. Certains individus particulièrement influençables pensent maintenant qu'il s'agit d'une sorte de prophétie. Les services de renseignements signalent que, dans les tréfonds de Castel, on trouve de plus en plus de détraqués aux yeux vitreux qui marmonnent les mots de cette "prophétie". S'ils ne représentent pas encore une menace, c'est un signe avant-coureur de graves troubles à venir. »
languages.original_text: "Alas, there is more. The end of the recording includes a fragment where Vladaym repeats ominous incoherent phrases in his near-death delirium. Some particularly impressionable individuals now believe it to be a prophecy of sorts. Reconnaissance reports that every day the lower levels of Footfall see more and more lunatics with glassy eyes mumbling the words of this 'prophecy.' They do not pose any threat yet, but it is an indication of greater troubles to come."

traits.locale_text: « Hélas, ça ne s'arrête pas là. La fin de l'enregistrement comporte un passage dans lequel Vladaym répète des phrases incohérentes et lugubres dans son délire de mort imminente. Certains individus particulièrement influençables pensent maintenant qu'il s'agit d'une sorte de prophétie. Les services de renseignements signalent que, dans les tréfonds de Castel, on trouve de plus en plus de détraqués aux yeux vitreux qui marmonnent les mots de cette "prophétie". S'ils ne représentent pas encore une menace, c'est un signe avant-coureur de graves troubles à venir. »

languages.text: "Leider gibt es noch mehr. Das Ende der Aufnahme enthält ein Fragment, bei dem man Vladaym in einer Art Nahtoderfahrung ständig düstere und zusammenhangslose Sätze fabulieren hört. Es gibt besonders leicht empfängliche Personen, die irgendwie glauben, dass es sich dabei um eine Art Prophezeiung handelt. Die Aufklärungseinheiten berichten, dass in den unteren Ebenen von Footfall mehr und mehr Wahnsinnige mit glasigen Augen die Worte dieser 'Prophezeiung' murmeln. Noch stellen sie keine Gefahr dar, doch das ist ein Zeichen, dass größerer Ärger drohen könnte."
languages.original_text: "Alas, there is more. The end of the recording includes a fragment where Vladaym repeats ominous incoherent phrases in his near-death delirium. Some particularly impressionable individuals now believe it to be a prophecy of sorts. Reconnaissance reports that every day the lower levels of Footfall see more and more lunatics with glassy eyes mumbling the words of this 'prophecy.' They do not pose any threat yet, but it is an indication of greater troubles to come."

traits.locale_text: "Leider gibt es noch mehr. Das Ende der Aufnahme enthält ein Fragment, bei dem man Vladaym in einer Art Nahtoderfahrung ständig düstere und zusammenhangslose Sätze fabulieren hört. Es gibt besonders leicht empfängliche Personen, die irgendwie glauben, dass es sich dabei um eine Art Prophezeiung handelt. Die Aufklärungseinheiten berichten, dass in den unteren Ebenen von Footfall mehr und mehr Wahnsinnige mit glasigen Augen die Worte dieser 'Prophezeiung' murmeln. Noch stellen sie keine Gefahr dar, doch das ist ein Zeichen, dass größerer Ärger drohen könnte."

languages.text: «Lamentablemente, eso no es todo. Al final de la grabación se incluye un fragmento en el que Vladaym repite frases siniestras e incoherentes mientras delira al borde de la muerte. Algunos individuos fácilmente influenciables ahora creen que es alguna clase de profecía. Nuestro equipo de reconocimiento nos ha informado de que cada día se ven más lunáticos con la mirada perdida, que merodean balbuceando estas palabras por los niveles inferiores de Paso. Todavía no suponen una amenaza, pero es un indicio de que se acercan problemas mayores».
languages.original_text: "Alas, there is more. The end of the recording includes a fragment where Vladaym repeats ominous incoherent phrases in his near-death delirium. Some particularly impressionable individuals now believe it to be a prophecy of sorts. Reconnaissance reports that every day the lower levels of Footfall see more and more lunatics with glassy eyes mumbling the words of this 'prophecy.' They do not pose any threat yet, but it is an indication of greater troubles to come."

traits.locale_text: «Lamentablemente, eso no es todo. Al final de la grabación se incluye un fragmento en el que Vladaym repite frases siniestras e incoherentes mientras delira al borde de la muerte. Algunos individuos fácilmente influenciables ahora creen que es alguna clase de profecía. Nuestro equipo de reconocimiento nos ha informado de que cada día se ven más lunáticos con la mirada perdida, que merodean balbuceando estas palabras por los niveles inferiores de Paso. Todavía no suponen una amenaza, pero es un indicio de que se acercan problemas mayores».

languages.text: 「残念ながら、まだ続きがあります。録音の最後には、ヴラダイムが死の間際の錯乱状態で、不吉な支離滅裂な言葉を繰り返す一節が含まれています。特に感受性の強い者たちの中には、それを一種の予言と信じる者も現れました。偵察によれば、フットフォールの下層部では、毎日、うつろな目でこの予言の言葉をつぶやく狂人が増え続けているとのことです。今のところ脅威とはなっていませんが、これはいずれ訪れるさらなる災厄の前兆かもしれません」
languages.original_text: "Alas, there is more. The end of the recording includes a fragment where Vladaym repeats ominous incoherent phrases in his near-death delirium. Some particularly impressionable individuals now believe it to be a prophecy of sorts. Reconnaissance reports that every day the lower levels of Footfall see more and more lunatics with glassy eyes mumbling the words of this 'prophecy.' They do not pose any threat yet, but it is an indication of greater troubles to come."

traits.locale_text: 「残念ながら、まだ続きがあります。録音の最後には、ヴラダイムが死の間際の錯乱状態で、不吉な支離滅裂な言葉を繰り返す一節が含まれています。特に感受性の強い者たちの中には、それを一種の予言と信じる者も現れました。偵察によれば、フットフォールの下層部では、毎日、うつろな目でこの予言の言葉をつぶやく狂人が増え続けているとのことです。今のところ脅威とはなっていませんが、これはいずれ訪れるさらなる災厄の前兆かもしれません」

languages.text: "Dahası da var. Kaydın sonunda Vladaym'ın ölüm döşeğindeyken tekrar tekrar zırvaladığı tuhaf sözler duyuluyor. Kimi duyarlı şahıslar, bu sözlerin bir kehanet olduğuna inanıyor. Keşif raporlarına göre Binliman'ın alt seviyelerinde bu sözde kehaneti ağzından düşürmeyen meczupların sayısı günden güne artıyor. Henüz bir tehdit teşkil ettikleri söylenemez ama hayra alamet değil tabii."
languages.original_text: "Alas, there is more. The end of the recording includes a fragment where Vladaym repeats ominous incoherent phrases in his near-death delirium. Some particularly impressionable individuals now believe it to be a prophecy of sorts. Reconnaissance reports that every day the lower levels of Footfall see more and more lunatics with glassy eyes mumbling the words of this 'prophecy.' They do not pose any threat yet, but it is an indication of greater troubles to come."
